# Other Research Experience


```{r experience_new, include = TRUE, eval=TRUE}
data <- rbind(
  tibble(
    what = "President",
    URL = "",
    when = "2022/9 - ongoing",
    with = "nQuerio - technological solution for advanced scientific research methods",
    where = "Montreal",
    details = c("Technological solution for advanced scientific research methods")
  ),
  tibble(
    what = "Research Laboratory Coordinator",
    URL = "",
    when = "2022 - ongoing",
    with = "Vitrai, UQAM, Université du Québec à Montréal",
    where = "Montreal",
    details = c("Research Laboratory Coordinator")
  ),
  tibble(
    what = "Research Assistant, Technical Assistance, Statistical Consulting",
    URL = "",
    when = "2021 - ongoing",
    with = "UQAM, Department of Psychology and École Supérieure de Gestion (EGS)",
    where = "Montreal",
    details = c(
      "Research assistance",
      "Technical assistance to the ethics committee",
      "Statistical consulting"
    )
  ),
  tibble(
    what = "Consultant in Statistical and Psychometric Analysis",
    URL = "",
    when = "2019/11 - 2019/12",
    with = "Gauthier Murtada and Partenaires",
    where = "Montreal",
    details = c("Consultant in Statistical and Psychometric Analysis")
  ),
  tibble(
    what = "Research Assistant",
    URL = "",
    when = "2016/10 - 2021/5",
    with = "Organizational Behavior Research Laboratory, UQAM",
    where = "Montreal",
    details = c("Several projects carried out under the supervision of Professor Nathalie Houlfort and Professor Robert J. Vallerand")
  ),
  tibble(
    what = "Research Assistant",
    URL = "",
    when = "2015/2 - 2015/12",
    with = "Institut de recherche sur l'intégration professionnelle des immigrants, Collège de Maisonneuve",
    where = "Montreal",
    details = c("Under the supervision of Dr. Monica Schlobach")
  )
)

data <- data %>%
  mutate(what = link(what, URL, color = "333333"))

detailed_entries(data, with, when, what, where, details, .protect = FALSE)
```
